docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Although the benefits of giving up smoking are well known, doctors believe they have found the first apparent hazard of kicking the habit, an increased risk of a rare but serious intestinal disease called ulcerative colitis.

headline.main: EVIDENCE GROWS ON POSSIBLE LINK OF FIBERGLASS AND LUNG ILLNESSES
